name: StudyRec - A Learning App to Manage Study Time Using Time-Lapse and Pomodoro Timer
description: StudyRec is a study application designed to enhance motivation by visualizing study time. By capturing time-lapse footage of the user studying, it restricts smartphone usage and allows sharing with friends. Additionally, it features a Pomodoro timer to help maintain concentration.

video.name: StudyRec - A Learning App to Manage Study Time Using Time-Lapse and Pomodoro Timer

By capturing time-lapse footage of the user studying, it restricts smartphone usage and allows sharing with friends. Additionally, it features a Pomodoro timer to help maintain concentration.
